# Sea-Souled (Trait)
## Overview
**Sea-Souled (Coastline or Island):** You are at home at sea. You receive a +1 trait bonus on [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] checks, and you can always take 10 while Swimming.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 63
